attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instead of selling them, we don't want a park on every spare bit of land there are homeless people and people living in unsatisfactory conditions.  This is every area in the UK

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Renthomes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
